name: project-workflows
title: Workflow Rule Manager
description:
This app helps you manage workflow rules in your projects, all in one place:

* Set the order for running on-change rules.
* Review rule requirement errors.
* Activate and deactivate rules directly in the list.
* Open rules in the built-in JavaScript editor.

widgets.name: Workflow Rules
widgets.description: Adds a dedicated tab to the project settings where you can view and manage workflow rules in a flat list. Set the order for running on-change rules based on their priority. Review rule requirement errors. Activate and deactivate rules directly in the list. Open rules in the built-in JavaScript editor.
